description: RPM build error: Missing dist-info directory '/usr/lib/python3/site-packages/Mongo_Thingy-0.17.2.dist-info' during package processing, likely due to incorrect buildroot setup or failed installation step.
4 test failures during %check phase including test_sphinx_directives and test_references_singlehtml, indicating compatibility issues with Pygments 2.19 or Sphinx integration problems.
RPM build error: Missing dist-info directory '/usr/lib/python3/site-packages/netCDF4-1.7.1.dist-info', accompanied by numpy deprecation warnings about empty array truth evaluation.
Documentation build failure: Missing git repository context prevents proper modification time detection for Sphinx docs, causing openstackdocstheme extension errors during doc generation.
2 test failures in caption handling (TestBlocksCaptionPrefix and TestBlocksCaptionAutoPrefix) during pytest execution, indicating issues with empty paragraph handling in Markdown extensions.
Build process timeout: hasher-privd exceeded 3600-second idle limit during rebuild, suggesting a hung process or unresolved dependency in Qt graph library compilation.
